item.title: Tips and Hints for Setting up NFSv4 with Kerberos with FreeIPA and FreeNAS
item.description: I have a FreeIPA server setup in my homelab which provides Kerberos and identity services. It seems like overkill, and it probably is, but I wanted to be able to use NFS which means that I need a way to keep user and groups in sync across my various machines …
item.dc:creator: Chris Scutcher
